name: Invader [GBA]
description:
You play a human on a planet that has to build as many buildings as possible but a force will prevent it. This game sends a message: Invader in the singular means that the invader is the human and that he massacres his planet.

Vincent Wilfrid - Programmer

Rousserie Baptiste - Programmer

Garcia Eric - 3d Artist - https://www.artstation.com/erga

Durbecq Julie - 3d Artist / Texture - https://www.artstation.com/jaggey

Mondoha Moeva - Game Designer / VFX

Tones Productions - Sound Designers

Bertrand Nicolas - Game Designer / UI Designer

Language : English

Platformer : PC

Engine : Unity 3D

Made in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2019

Theme: What home means to you
